title: Does Everyone Believe Hillary Is Crazy Now?
text:
On Friday, news broke that Hillary Clinton called Tulsi Gabbard a "Russian asset," and Hillary believes the Russians are now grooming Gabbard to run as a third-party candidate in 2020. Hillary also said that Jill Stein, the Green Party's nominee for President in 2016, was similarly a Russian asset who was responsible for Hillary's loss to President Trump.

Stein responded during an interview on CNN, characterizing Clinton's accusations as "a completely unhinged conspiracy theory for which there is absolutely no basis in fact." She continued, "this is a wild and insulting theory, and I think it speaks to Hillary's need to try and explain ... why her campaign was not successful."

.@TulsiGabbard isn't the only one that @HillaryClinton called a "Russian asset." She also called Jill Stein, who ran in 2016, one.



"This is a completely unhinged conspiracy theory for which there is no basis in fact. It's really outrageous." pic.twitter.com/BclU2cYQ8l — Washington Examiner (@dcexaminer) October 19, 2019

Stein is not the only one to defend Tusli Gabbard against Clinton. Beto O'Rourke told reporters that "Tulsi is not being groomed by anyone. She is her own person. Obviously has served this country, continues to serve this country in uniform, in Congress, as a candidate for the presidency, so I think those facts speak for themselves."

.@BetoORourke on @TulsiGabbard: "Tulsi is not being groomed by anyone. She is her own person. Obviously has served this country, continues to serve this country in uniform, in Congress, as a candidate for presidency so I think those facts speak for themselves." pic.twitter.com/dKnOVExx3H — The Hill (@thehill) October 19, 2019

Gabbard is a member of the Hawaii Army National Guard and recently took two weeks off from the campaign trail for a joint-training session in Indonesia. But Hillary would have you believe that she spent the time in Russia being "groomed" by Vladimir Putin.

Earlier today, Andrew Yang also defended his fellow rival for the Democratic nomination. Yang tweeted, "Tulsi Gabbard deserves much more respect and thanks than this. She literally just got back from serving our country abroad."

Tulsi Gabbard deserves much more respect and thanks than this. She literally just got back from serving our country abroad. — Andrew Yang?? (@AndrewYang) October 19, 2019

For Democrats, it's apparently not much fun when Hillary's conspiracy theories are directed towards them.
description: Democrats are slowly beginning to defend Tulsi Gabbard from Hillary's crazy accusations. .10/19/2019 23:26:26PM EST.
